clang-analyzer-optin.portability.UnixAPI.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-optin.portability.UnixAPI
Finds implementation-defined behavior in UNIX/Posix functions.
The
clang-analyzer-optin.portability.UnixAPI
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-optin.portability.UnixAPI.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
